website_summaries.verdict: Boasts a potent odor-busting combination of absorbent zeolite powder and fresh fragrance that's ideal for homes with multiple litter boxes.
pros: Zeolite powder absorbs odors and moisture while the fragrance takes care of any lingering nasties
Fresh scent keeps litter boxes smelling clean in between litter changes
cons: Sensitive kitties and pet parents might find the fragrance a bit overwhelming

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating, and overly scented!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the worst products I have ever purchased. The perfume scent that wafts from this product is so overwhelming, that it has literally caused me to sneeze non-stop since using it. It is nauseating to smell it, even if you're just opening it. I feel that it is so overly scented in an effort to mask the scent of urine; which by the way, it does not. You just end up with heavily urine scented perfume. I think I'm just better off going back to using baking soda, which seems to work better than this. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: cicisbo

customer_reviews.title: My house smelled, now it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: This works really great! I have the stinkiest cat on the planet. How such a handsome cat can make my nose hairs curl like that is beyond me. But since I’ve been using this product, I don’t always check the litter box because I can’t tell if he went!
customer_reviews.author: Nico S

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who don’t clean box as often
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t for me but is probably good for someone else. I am obsessive about keeping my cat box clean. I think this product is for people who don’t change the litter as often because they are granuals that resemble litter and directions say to add to a fresh box to keep the box fresh... this is great but I change my box too often for this to be beneficial. I honestly prefer the arm and hammer powder for a quick mix in after a stinky poo. I’ll end up amp tying the entire box in two days anyway so a quick freshen up does the trick for me
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally unhappy with this product. It has a STRONG perfumey smell and it actually made my kitties litter box stink! I scoop daily and since using this product the litter box smells like I don't even scoop weekly! I am going back to my good, old fashioned baking soda to eliminate the odor. That has been the best thing I've used. I am baffled by the many 5 star reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff. It is so much better than Arm and Hammer. It controls odor so well. I have 3 cats and 4 litter boxes. Adding this stuff makes it possible to scoop only once a day instead of twice. I was blown away. Thinking it was just another litter box powder, I was excited to realize it’s tiny gray granules that blend right in the litter. It doesn’t smell like fake perfume or flowery. It just smells clean. Love this and will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Leslianne

customer_reviews.title: I Love, Love, Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this 15 years ago. I use the Scoopfree automatic litter box and have tried various crystal litters over the years but within days it just smells. When I saw this I figured that I would give it a try since I have done everything else that I could think of (baking soda, air freshners, multiple other litter fresheners, ect). So, I tried this and its wonderful. I stir the crystals everyday and sprinkle some of this on top. There is no more smell and it works instantly. I so wish I found this secret long ago. My cat is very picky about her litter box and this has caused no issues using it.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty has very stinky poo and I was looking for a deodorized that might help neutralize his litter box a bit. I’ve been using this product daily for the last month and am so pleased that I already ordered a second container of it! I sprinkle some on top of the litter each time I scoop daily and feel like it definitely helps decrease the odor. The product itself doesn’t have a strong smell so it just seems like it neutralizes the foul odors without adding any chemical smells or other smells on top of it which is great. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Gross: Horrible Petrochemical Perfume
customer_reviews.text: AVOID if you or your cat have asthma, allergies, skin issues etc. As a matter of fact, avoid altogether even if you're healthy. The petroleum-derived fragrances are toxic, and no one should be breathing them; especially your cats at such close range. The truly active ingredient in this is the mineral. If they offered an unscented variety I'd buy it in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: silverapples

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money!! So, when I first purchased this it came in a very different container and it worked incredibly well. The scent was amazing, it worked like gangbusters and I needed very little. One container lasted for almost a month. Then the container changed, and I guess, so did the formula because I have to use so much to make a difference that it's gone in less than 2 weeks. And at $7.00 a container, that is a total ripoff! I wouldn't even mind so much if it actually worked, but it doesn't, at all. I don't know what Nature's Miracle did, but they have lost a customer forever.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Millen

customer_reviews.title: Strong fragrance but the cats don't seem to mind
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, this stuff is really fragranced. That said, while it about knocked me over my cats didn't seem to notice. I'm using it in an Open Air so it's not getting used exactly according to directions, I just shake some in when I top up the litter and have the unit cycle to mix it in. It's really helped with the overall smell of the box and once it's mixed in you can't smell it at all. I like it enough to have added it to my subscribe and save and it will be going in the other standard little box once I have more.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Wow it actually is helping. Worth a try. Best yet.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other products. Stuff you sprinkle in like this that seemed to be useless. Also a charcoal thing to absorb odor. In a small bathroom it didn't help a bit. I can't see how that helps anything. I had heard of nature's miracle, maybe even used it years ago. Gave it a try and the 1st day noticed a big difference. It stopped the smell from entering the rooms outside the bathroom. That's awesome. My cat is huge (22lbs.)and he drinks a lot and eats some of our dogs food in addition to his. So, this adds up to a lot more urine and stinkier poop than any cat we ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Btagent2

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: It is help some . I will by again for this price . I think it is help , but honestly I cannot tell much difference ,because i am using expensive cat litter anyway . I by this extra for the time when i have gest and company at my home . I am clean freak and smell freak ... i have 6 cats , 5 litter boxes and no smell what for ever , but it is cost me a lot keep all off the smell under control . I think this product help some , but do not expect to much if you are using are chip non clumping cat litter .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, clean smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used litter additives before and all were heavily perfumes. This has a scent but when you smell it, it’s almost like clean laundry. I can’t attest to the stank coverage yet as I just cleaned all boxes and put fresh litter in with this sprinkled on the bottom and top like it says to do and as I walked by I caught a whiff and was pleasantly surprised instead of repulsed as usual. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: shoppingismyrx

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfume for litter
customer_reviews.text: I feel like all this does is mask the smell. I sprinkle as the directions explain, it's basically cat waste that is covered in a perfume smell. I mean i was kinda hoping it would eliminate the odor or destroy it as the label is claiming. my cat hate the perfume smell and relives himself outside the box after i use it, so for it, it's a waste. baking soda is a dollar at the dollar tree and lasts longer and does a swell job removing odor from litter box. FYI
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Caraccia

customer_reviews.title: smells nice
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product but it does not last long, I have 4 cats and it lasted one week, that's scooping once a day. Maybe I used too much but it didn't seem that I did. Anyway , I guess I will go back to making my own until I find another product that will last longer update, I got this again and decided to use it more sparingly. It works great. You can’t even tell I have any cat. Until one scares the crap out of you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it makes my cat litter more ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it makes my cat litter more dusty. I have 99% dust free litter, so this is a definite con. I think it works for smells though, I think that I'll just use it sparingly from now on, and not coat the bottom of my litter box as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia SaysTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect odor destroyer!!
customer_reviews.text: We're obsessed with finding the right/perfect litter. We were using Fresh Step for a while, then switched to Precious Cat because the dust was a lot better. Unfortunately, the odor control was not as good. So I bought this to try to test it out and see how well it could control the odors. Now, some context: my cat is in the beginnings of renal failure (he's healthy for now, don't worry!) but he can drop some MAJOR STINKERS. I'm talking clear the whole room/floor/house level of stink. With this, it goes from 10+ on the stink level to 3. That's darn worth it in my opinion! You don't need too much either, so a bottle lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: The Philosophical Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I brought this since my two cats poop more often since I changed their food. The cat litter litter would smell bad more quickly than usual because of their new diet, this lasted for only 24 hours after that it MADE IT WORST. It enhanced the urine smell so bad, that it made it unbearable to go to the bathroom or near my kitchen. I did three cat litter changes before I stopped using it to make sure it was this and it was. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AFS

customer_reviews.title: Works Better Than Baking Soda
customer_reviews.text: I have a stinker of a cat who purposely tries to drive me out of the house with its god awful smelling excrement. This stuff preserves my sanity. The fragrance (perfume smell) subsides quickly, and I've tried baking soda, but this works much better. I didn't even wash out the litter box and apply it to the bottom. I just sprinkle a little over the top of the Arm & Hammer Platinum Clump & Seal litter, and it kills the odor. I don't use that much, so it the cost doesn't bother me; worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tanuki

customer_reviews.title: Light, fresh scent...works great!
customer_reviews.text: Light smell of fresh soap (if that makes sense)...nothing overpowering. It doesn't require a lot (at all) to work great. We use the Tidy Cats Breeze XL with Pine pellets system and this alleviates pretty much all bad odors. I sprinkle a little in the bottom tray (after scooping clean), a little in the waste bucket (with lid) and a little in the litter box on the pine pellets...fresh as a daisy! Like I said, smells fresh and it doesn't take much so it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dnnsgrrtt

customer_reviews.title: I forget to clean the litter bin...
customer_reviews.text: My cat probably hates this stuff, because it makes me forget to clean the box. I use Nature's Miracle with a deep layer of plant-based clumping litter (Smart Cat), and a Clever Cat litter bin. Those products combined create a scent free cat bathroom in my own bathroom. I figured the litter was doing all the scent absorbing on its own, but when I ran out of this stuff the difference was noticable! I tend to be forgetful, so I will frequently forget I need to clean the litter box until my cat starts complaining about it. Before, the smell would tell me it needed cleaning before she would. I'm a big fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: AJ M

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with "fragrance"
customer_reviews.text: I guess it seems to absorb some of the odors that my horrifically smelly cat produces. Seriously, he starts screaming in terror every time he poops and runs away from his box at full tilt as soon as he's done. It's awful. Well, this stuff dampens the effect for sure, but it also has a ton of "fragrance" in it that smells terrible in its own way. Now, I only use this when it's utterly imperative to combat the stench. The fragrance just makes me nauseous. I wish they would focus on absorbing smells rather than introducing new smells to your home.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Alan

customer_reviews.title: Got this for recycled litter pellets
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Breeze litter system, but needed a way to save money on the supplies so I started purchasing recycled litter pellets. Since they have no odor absorbing qualities I purchased a can of this to go with it. I know that this is for the cheap unscented litter, but it has worked just as well with the litter box I'm currently using. I don't know what this is made of, but it dang sure works to cut out the nasty cat box smell that I hate.
customer_reviews.author: SquarePeg

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: Ok, we ALL know the smell. You walk mere feet near the room that holds your cat’s potty space and the wall of, what can only be described as ammonia and rotting trash, hits you smack in the nostrils...never fun. THIS STUFF IS ACTUAL MAGIC. It keeps the litter fresh. I almost forgot to clean my cat’s litter box out. Oh and i have two cats, so you can only imagine how stinky it can get. I honestly don’t know how i lived without this!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandriabeth

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very picky she won't let me move her litter box not even an inch or make any changes in her "bathroom". I use Nature's Miracle litter which after one use smells terribly but my cat won't have any other litter so I was desperately looking for a good solution and this product works really well even with picky cats. I highly recommend this product. My only Con is that it is a small container and won't last long. I use 2 to 3 containers per month.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS FOR THE REST OF YOUR CATS 9 LIVES
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly a litter box game changer. I have 4 cats (and 4 litter boxes) and this helps with smell in the most incredible way. The powder smells GOOD to start off with, and the litter box smell basically evaporates. It's amazing. Obviously scoop the litter once or twice a week, but now you don't have to gag or struggle while you scoop! 100/10 stars I am hooked! Note - this is not my first rodeo I have bought several different items of this type and it truly takes the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wilken

customer_reviews.title: Freshens up the sometimes stinky situations!
customer_reviews.text: I only have one cat, and although I'm very strict about keeping her litter pan fresh and clean, there are times when one small "Dooty" smells like a an elephant took a poo in it! Even after scooping out the offending poo, the smell lingers. This product comes to the rescue! It instantly makes the smell go away and not in a perfumed overpowering way. What a fresh scent! Thank you for making "Little Kitty's" toxic cloud of poo smell go away fast!
customer_reviews.author: DeborahTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think it was working because it has no scent, but it is!
customer_reviews.text: My headline pretty much sums up this product; I didn't think this product would do anything to treat the smell of my cat litter because it has no scent, but this stuff really works! I am surprised every time my cat uses the litter that I'm not smelling the stench I used to smell. I do wish it had some scent because I like the added air freshener, but I'll accept the lack of scent for lack of litter stench.
customer_reviews.author: Jinjer

customer_reviews.title: Was not worth it for me.
customer_reviews.text: This powder is super easy to use. You just sprinkle it on your litter. Cons: the deodorant itself smells weird. When it mixes with cat litter, it actually starts to smell worse than before. I think this is good to revive litter for maybe an extra day after that, you want to toss the whole thing out. It's definitely not good for long term use and doesnt really help you keep your litter fresh longer for more than an extra day or two before making it smell worse. It wasnt worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kim

customer_reviews.title: I’m a repeat purchaser for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the BOMB. Not too expensive, works superrrr well. I use it with Dr. Elsey’s Ultra cat litter. I wear gloves, scrub the litter box with a sponge + soap + water, then dry it and spray with cooking spray (helps keep litter from sticking to the bottom). Then I spread 1⁄4 cup of this, fill box with litter and top with another 1⁄4 cup of this. Hides the litter scent so well. Works like a charm. Makes cleanup a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dabney R.

customer_reviews.title: Product is as expected, just not what I want to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not saying it's a bad product it's just not exactly what I wanted. I'm going to try something different to keep the kitty litter cost down. I use a clumping cat litter that works great it is at a great price. But it doesn't have a scent to it. I'm going to try to to a quarter amount of a cat litter that has a scent that's more expensive with 3/4 of the one I can afford. But someone else had said it made their cat litter dustier I believe that might be true I notice more dust this last month. Just don't think it fixed the problem I I am having
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what my cats prefer, but I like and get this when I can
customer_reviews.text: My cats use the litterboxes wether I use this, store brand, or the Arm and Hammer variant. I prefer this because it doesn't have that strong smell of the Arm and Hammer brand that sometimes can be overwhelming. The Petsmart brand is maybe the only competitive product, but I still prefer this brand not just out of convenience but because I've had good experiences with Nature's Miracles other products such as their urine and odor cleaner and destroyer.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: no cat box odor, but not sure how long the bottle will last
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this a few days ago, but so far have noticed no odor coming from the litter box. The only concern I have is that the bottle may run out quickly as the instructions state to add a layer to the top and bottom of the box every time you change it and sprinkle a layer on top every time you clean it. I assume this will run out in a month or so with one cat and one litter box. As long as the price stays under $10, I consider it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kiki717

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Miracle Just for Cats Odor Destroyer Litter Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product.....if you use it sparingly and do regular clean up as I do. It does have a scent though it's quite tolerable and our cat has no problem with it. I DO NOT use it quite directed... I use a pellet litter, keeping it shallow (no more than two inches, and scoop several times a day...then sprinkle just a very light shake across the litter and that keeps any and all odors at bay....no need to overuse. Overuse might make it overpowering.. Definitely will buy again and encourage you to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetgirl

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I found this product!
customer_reviews.text: This has honestly changed my life. I use it in the litterboxes and trash can and even in the yard where my dogs like to "go" and it works wonders. Just sprinkle a little wherever you have an odor problem. I buy one a month with "subscribe and save" and one lasts through the month. I don't think the scent is too overwhelming either. The people who wrote bad reviews saying that it doesn't work may need to change their cat's diet. I've found that when you use certain cheap cat food brands there is nothing on Earth you can do to mask the odor.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Best. Buy. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Knocks out the litter smell amazingly. I have allergies to scents and my cats do as well. This sprinkles over the top and we are all happy. I don't find the scent overpowering at all and use unscented litter. I have 3 cats and two boxes and clean them every other day. A little is enough to freshen after each clean and the container lasts a decent amount of time. I'm sold on this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: This is great, have used it for years!
customer_reviews.text: We have five cats, so wanted something for occasional odors, and this does the job very well! You don't need to sprinkle alot either, because it seems concentrated enough to fight odors quickly..Our cats don't have smelly stool much because we avoid fish in their food, and only feed non grain canned food and a little non grain dry food...Mix it into the litter so the cats aren't stepping into it, they don't need to be licking that off their paws even if it is non toxic...:-)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn N.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again and again and...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this! Best thing ever for litter boxes. I have 2 cats and one is very fussy, she hates sharing a litter box with other cat. Now with this product we only have one litter box in the house. No nasty odors. Also, you don’t need to use a lot
customer_reviews.author: Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand, not this prodct
customer_reviews.text: With all the fabulous reviews, I was really praying this worked! I have 4 litter boxes and 1-2 of my cats have really stinky #2! This product did nothing to help alleviate smellls. It is like heavily scented litter you use with regular litter. Wanted to love it but.....I think it was a complete dud and was just extra work to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rubydoo67

customer_reviews.title: Not lightly scented
customer_reviews.text: I use unscented litter for a reason, so I was a bit leery about trying this but decided to as reviewers referred to the scent as "light." I found the scent to be quite cloying and will now try to find an alternative. I was using a citrus scented product that did have a light scent and worked well, but unfortunately, it's no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: GardenGirl

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product! The best ever. I followed the instructions and I no longer SMELL cat box! Yeepee!! I use special kitty tight clumping litter, green and white box. It works great with this product! I'm a customer for life! And it last along time. I do clean my box twice a day, morning and night then sprinkle the product on top again after I scoop. NO more stinking catbox.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. A much better alternative to baking soda as an odor reducers. This stuff doesn't make the litter as moist as using baking soda does so you get an easier clean up and works great on reducing the odor. I use it in an automated litter box that pushes a grate through the litter to deposit the waste into a receptacle. Because of this, I prefer this product over baking soda because it keeps the grate from becoming too gunked up which tends to make the electronic grate jam up and stop working. Great product and a wonderful odor reducer.
customer_reviews.author: SerenityDawn

customer_reviews.title: It works! It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment and it just felt like everyone could immediately smell that we have a cat. When we first poured some on the litter, the whole place smelled like clean laundry for a few hours. Then it faded and there is no cat smells whatsoever! We even had a few friends over that complimented how great it smelled 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: This really helps get a little extra time out of your litter. I have a big cat so the litter seems to stink fast. This is also useful if you have someone coming over with no time to completely change the litter and it smells after you scoop. Sprinkle some of this in the pan and you are all set. The odor is nice, at least to me and doesn’t overpower.
customer_reviews.author: Zona lady

customer_reviews.title: 2 cats. two boxes. love the product.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. They urinate a lot as cat owners know, and we humans have tough schedules, so we clean the litter boxes about twice a week, completely exchanging litter once every 2 weeks to once a month. Turned the odor in the house around overnight, literally. Pleasant scent, but subtle...not overwhelming and not overtly emanating from the boxes as many other powder-based litter-box deodorizers. It doesn't smell like we're trying to cover bad litter odor anymore. Highly recommend. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amznlvr

customer_reviews.title: Helps ammonia smell - for about a day until you need to add more.
customer_reviews.text: Strong perfume smell that seems to mask the urine odor. Or maybe it eliminates it a bit. I only have 1 cat. He was neutered late and he's male - so his pee can smell pretty bad (compared to my other male cat who was neutered young). I might also need to switch from Tidy Cats litter, since I can still smell everything in his litter closet. This is VERY helpful in a small apartment. It only lasts about a day until you need more. The can will go faster than you'd think.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite litter powders. It really does a good job of getting rid of cat box odors. The powder itself has a strong perfume scent when you first shake it out though. I would really love it if Nature's Miracle made an unscented version of the powder.
customer_reviews.author: rev42

customer_reviews.title: Used for decades and still happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We've used Nature's Miracle litter box treatment for decades. It is an amazing product for neutralizing kitty odors. Works particularly well for urine odors - sprinkled into litter, you will not be forced out of the room if kitty makes a deposit. So happy this product continues to be available, it works.
customer_reviews.author: KBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I use this to supplement the other cleaning products I use in the litter box area. In warm weather even a clean box can smell worry a little, so I sprinkle it in the boxes and around them (I don't worry about the floor, it's in a separate area away from people). I prefer to use this instead of using scented cat litter and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Catmom

customer_reviews.title: made it worse
customer_reviews.text: honestly, was incredibly disappointed. bought this because of the great reviews, and needed something to help the odor - I clean my litter box daily even - this maybe helps for a total of 5 minutes, if it helps at all. it reeks an awful gnemonia smell, I can’t even breathe around it. I feel like it’s truly made the entire thing worse. I do not recommend. I will be buying a fancy odor proof box now, too bad something like this didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate - buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Recently got a cat and the smell of the litter box has been driving me insane. I got a piece of furniture that the litter box goes inside and that has helped but not enough. This cheap litter powder stuff has helped twice as much as the $200 furniture I bought. Wish I bought this months ago!
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitty....happy home.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for some time now, and it seems to work very well. Sure, it costs more, but I'd rather pay a bit more to avoid a stinky cat box and home! Best application seems to be sprinkling on bottom of clean empty litter box, then pouring clean litter over the top of it. Make sure to clean the box daily, and as you do mix some in. When it gets to the point that the litter needs to be completely replaced this product is not as effective at that point.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louis Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Better than baking soda!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and they make the stinkiest poops known to mankind. Natures miracle just for cats works is the hero my nose deserves. The scent is perfect, not too strong, not flowery, maybe in the spectrum of baby powder. It really does eliminate the odor of poop instantly. The texture and color are undetectable amongst the litter. Love it, and now subscribing to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Effective product. Make the litter lasts longer and instantly remove oder smells. Still need to change out the litter and disinfect the box on a regular basis. The lack of smell on the surface can hide the urine smell underneath.
customer_reviews.author: K. G. Kloster

customer_reviews.title: Really does control the odor
customer_reviews.text: got this for the cat box. Am using Nature's Miracle cat litter, but by itself it was smelling like a cat box pretty quickly. So I got this. Sprinkle on the bottom and some on the top and rake it in. I can't really believe that I walk into the cat's room and don't even remember that there is a cat box there. I look over at it and clean it out, (I put the waste in those sealable baggies) sprinkle a bit more in, and it really does control the odor. Amazing. And no "perfumey" smells. Great Stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfume-y, but otherwise it really does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Well, it does have a strong floral perfume-y odor as other reviewers have said, no doubt there. But good news, is it does seem to do the trick to help avoid litterbox smells. I've tried baking soda for a long time, and I never found that it worked as well as I wanted it to. This stuff does the trick. But it does smell like perfume, a lot. Even after it's in the litterbox for a week, scooping the litter, you know it's in there. Thankfully the cats don't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeHate

customer_reviews.title: Light scent
customer_reviews.text: The seller delivered product fast. The scent of this product is very light and did the trick. This seller is great but I prefer a strong frangrence like arm and hammer baking soda powder. If your looking for a delicate scent for the litter box this is for you. If you like strong aroma then try the baking soda by arm n hammer.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the time needed between litter box changes
customer_reviews.text: This item is a little expensive for the price compared to other products on the market that are similar. It does work well to help stretch the time needed between complete litter changes. I like how it is grey so it matches the color of the litter. The scent is a little much, but it is better than the alternative! My cats don't seem to mind the scent.
customer_reviews.author: NL80

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought for my neighbor because Everytime I walk out my back door in a back hallway all's I would smell as there litter boxes now I don't smell the neighbors litter boxes at all for the effectiveness and the price I will continue to order it for my neighbor
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and might even encourage your cat to dump outside!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product decreases the malodorous scent that comes when my cat takes a large dump. I use that organic kitty litter made of chest nuts which on the whole does a good job, but my cat refuses to cover her excrement. I can always get a whiff of her dump, and now I don’t. I think that this product has encouraged her to dump outside more frequently, as I am finding less hard fecal matter in the box. YAAAS.... Not only do I smell less but I have the added benefit of training my cat to not use the kitty litter when I am at home!!! What a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Itellnolies

customer_reviews.title: a true miracle .
customer_reviews.text: this paired with natures miracle clumping corn litter is a miracle worker ! its a very light fresh scent which is perfect . ive noticed with the arm n hammer powder , it was very strong and almost amplified the urine smell . i wish i would have been using this 2 years ago .
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Does help mask pet litter odour
customer_reviews.text: Poured it in with my cats litter and it actually made it smell fresh for longer then normal .. I actually empty out my litter pan twice a day but wanted something to make it smell Somewhat ok to walk past during the day when we have guests over as we have our litter pan in our living room corner and it did the trick . It’s a good size as well .
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Really is a miracle!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really is a miracle! It works wonders, smells very strong but seems to really help eliminate the cat odors plus the cats don't seem to mind the strong scent! That being said, a little goes a loooong way with this stuff, so I recommend only sprinkling a little at a time. It works great if you sprinkle some over the litter box right after cleaning it and I usually mix it in a tiny bit, mostly so that my cats don't inhale a huge whiff of the scent in one area. It works wonders, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nature 's Miracle Litter Box powder works well on smell
customer_reviews.text: A nice product to extend litter life. It works well to absorb the liquid urine and cut the smell. I use it after I scoop daily. I have been able to go down to 2 large boxes for my 7 cats with the use of this product, daily to twice daily scooping, full change every 3-4 days
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely needed if you have a litter box
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well! I like that it doesn't contain any fake smells to just mask the unpleasant odor from the litter box. This truly has made a difference in the smells without just adding fake flower sent to the terrible smell. The can lasted about a month and i have already ordered another. I am new to having to deal with a litter box so i am up for anything to make the litter box smell better. I have now purchased several other Nature's Miracle products.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Philhart

customer_reviews.title: The only one that works.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only one I have found that works so well. I have two cats with a litter box in a small RV bathroom. I’m pleased and so are they. It somehow works without being flowery or scented to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Oxley

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I normally use baking soda or scented carpet fresh baking soda in my litter box. This does the job just as well and isn't powdery so it doesn't fly everywhere. Doesn't take much, but I'd recommend using it every other day if you have two cats in one box like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shopper

customer_reviews.title: DUSTY!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this product, but NO WAY is it Low Dust!! I never had any reaction to litter, powders, even ALL the Big Bags of Bird seed, for all my outdoor feeders or even my 35 yrs old, Red Lourd Amazon Parrot. Until a Really bitter cold winter some 12 yrs or so back, then came Broncitis, next Asthma. Now Dust triggers my Asthma, so I do Everything to avoid dust. Strange, but Baby Powder doesn't affect me. I think its a heavier powder that drifts straight down. So Anything that Causes DUST goes Right to the garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: Angeliza

customer_reviews.title: A Great Boost For Litter On Humid Days
customer_reviews.text: This product does its job without any overpowering, cloying scent. Works well on littler for those humid days when it seems nothing seems dry, not even clean litter. It's nice to add a little extra without it smelling up an entire room. Good size and good price! I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Catanese

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I’m very sensitive to strong odors and I do not like scented litters. I was a little concerned by the reviews saying this stuff has a strong scent. I have to tell you, it definitely does. However, you only have to use the tiniest amount. I use about half a teaspoon in the entire litter box and mix it around. It really helps with litter odor.
customer_reviews.author: Josie James

customer_reviews.title: Still can smell when the cat takes a big crap when I'm nearby but otherwise...
customer_reviews.text: I don't smell that dang catbox at all. Works great on the pee smell. Really does wonders removing that cat stank. Has a slight scent (florally) that you can smell when applying - not bad at all but it is indeed scented. Just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Scented
customer_reviews.text: I just assumed this was unscented but it's not. It has some horrible perfume added to it that I hate and my cats hate. My one cat was trying to get the scent off of herself by over bathing and now has bald spots all over her hindquarters.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: We have 4 cats and 6 boxes, based on ...
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 cats and 6 boxes, based on the prior reviews I was hesitant but for the price thought it was worth a shot. I'm not sure if it is this or the air fresheners (Citrus Magic Pet) but you can hardly tell we have litter boxes in the house. Definitely using as a regular addition to our boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the scent of this and it does really cover up unpleasant smells from the cat boxes. The scent is not overpowering like some others I have used or smell like strong cleaning products. It's a nice light and clean scent and it blends into the litter nicely. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars -- the scent doesn't stay long enough, I do have to sprinkle it in almost every day in one of the cat boxes but that could be because that kitty pees like a million times a day. Overall a great product though and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JLittle

customer_reviews.title: Helps with bad cat urine odor, and seems to last fairly long
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job mitigating the bad cat odors. Cat urine really affects my sinuses, and this remediates it pretty darn well. Just keep the litter box relatively clean of poo, and use this product when putting in new litter into the box.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This was WAY to purrfumed
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Nature's Miracle products, but the scent from just the little bit I sprinkled as a test was WAY too overpowering for daily use. My two cats got used to it somewhat (they avoided using the small corner where I'd sprinkled it as a test) - however by day two I couldn't stand the floral scent any longer. It DID, however, get rid of any other litter box smells and didn't seem to affect the litter clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love Natures Miracle products. This product lives up the their reputation. I just sprinkle this powder on the top of the cat litter after scooping and any lingering odor is neutralized instantly. It allows the cat litter to be used longer without changing. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: D Christianson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I keep my cats box pretty clean and empty it every 1-2 days, but she tends to leave quite a smell behind (i don’t use scented litter, so this is why) and this product completely got rid of any lingering smells!! Definitely will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey

customer_reviews.title: lasts days
customer_reviews.text: I have a young male kitten who always has a strong odor despite my best efforts. I've tried name brand deodorizer crystals and powders, they last hours where as this one has lasted days. I have definitely found my new powder
customer_reviews.author: Leah Mills

customer_reviews.title: ODOR FREE
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works well. My cat will not use a hooded litter box, so I had to buy one with tall sides because my cat stands while using the box. In addition, she insists on only using the front, of the pan. As a result of always going in the same place, the litter pan retained odors. Nature's Miracle has alleviated the odors and I will continue using it. I followed the directions and I no longer have an offensive odor, in the room the litter box is in.
customer_reviews.author: 3GIRLSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Covers odors like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over a month now. We bought it to use for our cat's litter box when we took her on vacation and would be staying in someone's home (a pet-friendly AirBNB). We had the litter box in the room with us and this product completely masked the scent. We used it in conjunction with a covered litter box for maximum odor coverage. It had the added benefit of making our cat smell nice after trips to the cat box, as opposed to the way she'd smell before we started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant out there!
customer_reviews.text: Used many different litter deodorizer and this wins hands down......cats are very sensitive to smell. So don't be surprised when kitty doesn't like your thoughtful purchase of lavender or glade scented litter. They like plain un scented, my cats didn't even like worlds best because of the strong wood smell (that I loved). I use clump and seal....or use an unscented litter and natures best deodorant for daily freshening.....you'll have a happy kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay too perfumey
customer_reviews.text: This has such a strong perfume scent that I can't tell if it neutralizes litter odors or just masks them. My cats don't seem to mind the scent...but I also sprinkle very little in their box because the perfume is so pungent. It might be less of an issue in a large, open room, but even a small amount overpowers the entire bathroom and starts to give me a headache. I'm using up this can, one teeny sprinkle at a time, but won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlen Jay Exum

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved!!
customer_reviews.text: For this as an extra measure to get our fixed male cat to stop spraying and going potty around the house and choose to use his litter box. Actually worked like a charm! Fresh litter box meant our kitty returned to using his litter box and not the rest of the house! Phew!
customer_reviews.author: Dree Batley

customer_reviews.title: Not powder, granular
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great but it's granular, like clumping litter, not powder as indicated. It makes a mess with any litter other than standard clay litter, which means I was unable to use it on 3/5 of my litter boxes. Good enough product, needs a more accurate description.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Olcese

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but Arm & Hammer is better and costs less
customer_reviews.text: I tried this but in my experience it doesn't work as well as the Arm & Hammer cat box deodorizer, which also costs less. The Nature's Miracle product is only a little better than using nothing at all. The one I recommend instead is this:
customer_reviews.author: Social science professor

customer_reviews.title: The smell of perfume and poop
customer_reviews.text: SORRY TO DISAPPOINT, but this product is not the miracle solution that will eliminate the need to do gross deep-cleans of our litter boxes. :( I experimented with using it in 1 of 2 litter boxes -- it adds a fairly heavy perfume scent, but both boxes still had the same level of stink. Luckily the perfume smell doesn't travel far, so it doesn't stink up your whole abode. I don't plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This smells great and it does work just not for more than a couple of days! I only have one cat and clean my litter box every other day. And empty/refill weekly. This helps but only for a few days....
customer_reviews.author: Pisces Lady

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Completely eliminates any cat box odor. A small amount works wonders. Spend the money on Nature’s Miracle products. I’ve tried others but none come close to the superiority of Nature’s Miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Use it in a litter box , it does work well . It eliminates odors and freshens up the litter box . It also works on spots on the floor . My cat once piss on the floor and after cleaning it up I still could smell it . I put this powder on it and vacuumed it up next day - there was no smell and no spots left on the tile and grout .
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Life just smells better
customer_reviews.text: Two litter boxes are tough to keep up on. This makes the job a bit more bearable. I sprinkle some on the bottom of the box before adding the litter for happiness. That little jar goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Average Jim

customer_reviews.title: Must have when you have litter boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing for my cats litter boxes. I also sprinkle some on the pellets of Breeze System too. Just makes everything smell better. I have it in my subscribe & save so I don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh. I’ll pass.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but didn’t really notice any difference between using it or not using it.
customer_reviews.author: H. B.

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed with this Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works well. Had issues with the litter smell. Use dr elsys ultra scented litter and clean on a regular basis and the smell would still linger strong. Used this with the litter and it's helped a lot! So well, that i set up a monthly subscription. It works well with the litter robot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for 2 days only
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use but last only for 2 days. after 2 days the odor came back. I have to clean the litter box and re-apply it. If you're looking for something that can last longer, shop others.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Too dusty. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo dusty. Gets in my eyes. And I'm not one of these sensitive people that has perfume allergies and issues with smells. This stuff was ridiculously Dusty it really bothered me and I'm pretty sure it bothered my cats.
customer_reviews.author: lilblondjen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! I've been using it along with the spray ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I've been using it along with the spray version and it really helps prolong the time between complete litterbox cleanings. I use World's Best Multicat Litter and without this stuff after a while it would start to smell musty and fail to absorb poop smells. But after I started using this regularly I haven't noticed any smells.
customer_reviews.author: Absurdexistsence

customer_reviews.title: That's some good smelling pooh
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different products over the years. This has so far been one of my favorites. Others scent fades pretty quickly. This one tends to last and keep the other scenes at Bay.
customer_reviews.author: That KC Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff...get it!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I use this sooner? Fabulous odor remover. In combination with Arm and Hammer clump and seal and our new cattit hooded litter box we no longer smell that 'cat urine' odor in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Scooch

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats who use the box often. I tried this out but the scent almost seemed worse the the dirty litter. I don't think I would repurchase unless they offered a better fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Fernandez

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle Just for Cats Odor Destroyer
product_meta.description:
Nature's Miracle pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 30 years. With the expansion to training aids, cat litter, disinfectants and other products, Nature’s Miracle brand can be trusted to provide innovative solutions to a range of pet problems.

Nature's Miracle Pet Wipes clean and groom your dog, cat, and other small animals safely and naturally, thoroughly moisturizing the pet's coat and paws. Use Nature's Miracle Pet Wipes to remove dirt from your pet's coat and paws after walks or before entering the house. These wipes can also be used to keep pets clean and fresh in between baths or on pets that are difficult to bathe. The wipes contain natural moisturizers which soften pet's coat, leaving it healthy and shiny. Pet wipes keep the pet cleaner, eliminating odor build-up and saving trips to the groomer!

Trust the miracle when finding solutions for a clean home and a happy, healthy pet.
feature_bullets: Quality And Performance Driven Products For Your Pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with United Pet Group

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
